title: BT
description: BT's vibrant color palette reflects its dynamic and innovative presence in the telecommunications industry. The notable colors include a striking magenta (#D52685), deep purple (#553A99), lively green (#6CBC35), warm orange (#FD9F3E), and a classic blue (#08538C). These colors are outlined in BT's official brand guidelines available on Getech. The brand aesthetic captures attention and maintains an energetic yet trustworthy visual identity.
